questions.question: Do you have discussed innovation program in the account with your client?

options.answer: Please Select

questions.question: Do you understand your client business challenges?

options.answer: Please Select

Yes, I am aware of client business objectives

options.answer: Please Select

Yes, I have strategically resourced my project to deliver new technologies and solutions to clients considering current work and future pipeline of assignments
